scripts.test-next: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node --enable-source-maps -r source-map-support/register -r dotenv/config --require dotenv/config --env-file=.env --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test
scripts.local: CHAIN=local CLOUD=local COMPILE=false DEBUG=false yarn test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.local:whitelist: CHAIN=local CLOUD=local COMPILE=false WHITELIST_ADMIN=true WHITELIST_OFFER=true npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.lightnet: CHAIN=lightnet CLOUD=local COMPILE=false npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.devnet:local: CHAIN=devnet CLOUD=local COMPILE=false npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.devnet:zkcloudworker: CHAIN=devnet CLOUD=zkcloudworker COMPILE=false npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.zeko:local: CHAIN=zeko CLOUD=local COMPILE=false yarn test worker.test
scripts.zeko:zkcloudworker:whitelist: CHAIN=zeko CLOUD=zkcloudworker COMPILE=false WHITELIST_ADMIN=true WHITELIST_OFFER=true yarn test ./test/worker.test.ts
